about.description:
A Sphinx extension that builds an HTML gallery of examples from any set of
Python scripts. It is extracted from the scikit-learn project and aims to
be an independent general purpose extension.

about.summary: Sphinx extension for automatic generation of an example gallery

name: sphinx-gallery
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "sphinx-gallery" %}
{% set version = "0.1.8" %}
{% set sha256 = "c91e68dceb6f6a1dc488d6f39fbb417b7a1d1ff130d3e6311965f5ecb351ec0c" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - nose
  run:
    - python
    - matplotlib
    - pillow
    - sphinx

test:
  imports:
    - sphinx_gallery
    - sphinx_gallery.gen_gallery

about:
  home: https://github.com/sphinx-gallery/sphinx-gallery
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Sphinx extension for automatic generation of an example gallery'
  description: |
    A Sphinx extension that builds an HTML gallery of examples from any set of
    Python scripts. It is extracted from the scikit-learn project and aims to
    be an independent general purpose extension.
  doc_url: https://sphinx-gallery.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/sphinx-gallery/sphinx-gallery

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dfroger

about.description:
A Sphinx extension that builds an HTML gallery of examples from any set of
Python scripts. It is extracted from the scikit-learn project and aims to
be an independent general purpose extension.
